name: MIDINetworkSession
desc: An object that represents a pairing of a source and destination.

items.name: var isEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the session is enabled.

items.name: var connectionPolicy: MIDINetworkConnectionPolicy
items.desc: The policy that determines who can connect to this session.

items.name: var localName: String
items.desc: The name of this session’s entity.

items.name: var networkName: String
items.desc: The name with which this session advertises itself over Bonjour.

items.name: func connections() -> Set<MIDINetworkConnection>
items.desc: Returns the session’s set of MIDI network connections.

items.name: func addConnection(MIDINetworkConnection) -> Bool
items.desc: Adds a new connection to this session.

items.name: func removeConnection(MIDINetworkConnection) -> Bool
items.desc: Removes a connection from this session.

items.name: func contacts() -> Set<MIDINetworkHost>
items.desc: Returns the array of network hosts.

items.name: func addContact(MIDINetworkHost) -> Bool
items.desc: Adds a host as a contact.

items.name: func removeContact(MIDINetworkHost) -> Bool
items.desc: Removes a host as a contact.

items.name: let MIDINetworkNotificationContactsDidChange: String
items.desc: Indicates that the list of contacts changed.

items.name: let MIDINetworkNotificationSessionDidChange: String
items.desc: Indicates that other aspects of the session changed, such as the connection list, connection policy, and so on.
